Articles.Content:
Hello,

i notice this problem very recently.

when I want to launch a rocket or a plane with a cockpit, with kerbal on board, it stay motionless on the launchpad.

every rocket or plane that I used in the past, now are all unavaiable for this problem.

also the plane in stock in the kerbal game.

I can only fly with the remote control

what I can do?

What is your mod list? Would you by any change use a mod call Remote Tech? When you mean "it stays motionless", can you elaborate? Maybe upload a screenshot, it might help.

When you mean the past, what have you changed since that moment? And what was the past time in question?

Edited January 30, 2016 by Benoit Hage
